item.title: Deploying Quartz to the Web
item.description: Hosting on GitHub Pages Quartz is designed to be effortless to deploy. If you forked and cloned Quartz directly from the repository, everything should already be good to go!
Colophon: ![[notes/images/under-construction-gif.gif|50]] Commands: http://localhost:1313/ make serve Made using Quartz Todo Check to see if you want to use enableSPA (Set in config.
In the nights the way you cry I see you fear her that you never could grow enough to be enough

item.title: about this project
item.description: This project initially started at 2 in the morning, on the last day of march in 2021. hello friends! iâ€™m starting an ambitious project tonight to share all of my music, and i would like to write about it publicly here.

item.title: ductape
item.description: Lyrics ==chorus== ductape ain’t as sticky as they’d like you to think nor strings as strong as advertised luster won’t always remain in lover’s eyes nor intentions stay the same move along, but not too fast not all things are meant to last

item.title: excuse me present, i'd like to meet the past and future
item.description: Lyrics Did you ever stand above anyone else As you stand above me now Or can anyone else, see your colors As I see them now And it’s just plain jealous of me To say only I can see you through But I just can’t bear the thought That someone else could fulfill you

item.title: god machine
item.description: Lyrics I’m an old man inside a young man’s body in that I’m never content to let the past stand my little sandbox of my head is so full of things that I could not face I buried them saying another time, another place

item.title: incomplete
item.description: type: #songlet, #improvisation On July the 6th at 11:36pm, I tweeted: Tonight I had a somewhat trsnscendent musical experience, which I think I managed to record.

item.title: Troubleshooting and FAQ
item.description: Can I host this myself and not on GitHub Pages? Yes! All built files can be found under /public in the master branch.
